ReferenceBlocks.text: His disciples didn't understand these things at first, but when Jesus was glorified, then they remembered that these things were written about him, and that they had done these things to him.

block.text: Mula-mula murid-murid Yesus tidak mengerti akan hal itu, tetapi sesudah Yesus dimuliakan, teringatlah mereka, bahwa nas itu mengenai Dia, dan bahwa mereka telah melakukannya juga untuk Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of the tomb, and raised him from the dead, was testifying about it.

block.text: Orang banyak yang bersama-sama dengan Dia ketika Ia memanggil Lazarus keluar dari kubur dan membangkitkannya dari antara orang mati, memberi kesaksian tentang Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause also the multitude went and met him, because they heard that he had done this sign.

block.text: Sebab itu orang banyak itu pergi menyongsong Dia, karena mereka mendengar, bahwa Ia yang membuat mujizat itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves,

block.text: Maka kata orang-orang Farisi seorang kepada yang lain:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “See, this is getting us nowhere. The whole world is going after him!”

block.text: <<Kamu lihat sendiri, bahwa kamu sama sekali tidak berhasil, lihatlah, seluruh dunia datang mengikuti Dia.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now there were certain Greeks among those that went up to worship at the feast.

block.text: Di antara mereka yang berangkat untuk beribadah pada hari raya itu, terdapat beberapa orang Yunani.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These, therefore, came to Philip, who was from Bethsaida of Galilee, and asked him, saying,

block.text: Orang-orang itu pergi kepada Filipus, yang berasal dari Betsaida di Galilea, lalu berkata kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sir, we want to see Jesus.”

block.text: <<Tuan, kami ingin bertemu dengan Yesus.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Philip came and told Andrew, and in turn, Andrew came with Philip, and they told Jesus.
Jesus answered them,

block.text: Filipus pergi memberitahukannya kepada Andreas; Andreas dan Filipus menyampaikannya pula kepada Yesus.
Tetapi Yesus menjawab mereka, kata-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The time has come for the Son of Man to be glorified.

block.text: <<Telah tiba saatnya Anak Manusia dimuliakan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies, it remains by itself alone. But if it dies, it bears much fruit.

block.text: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya jikalau biji gandum tidak jatuh ke dalam tanah dan mati, ia tetap satu biji saja; tetapi jika ia mati, ia akan menghasilkan banyak buah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who loves his life will lose it. He who hates his life in this world will keep it to eternal life.

block.text: Barangsiapa mencintai nyawanya, ia akan kehilangan nyawanya, tetapi barangsiapa tidak mencintai nyawanya di dunia ini, ia akan memeliharanya untuk hidup yang kekal.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone serves me, let him follow me. Where I am, there will my servant also be. If anyone serves me, the Father will honor him.”

block.text: Barangsiapa melayani Aku, ia harus mengikut Aku dan di mana Aku berada, di situpun pelayan-Ku akan berada. Barangsiapa melayani Aku, ia akan dihormati Bapa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now my soul is troubled. What shall I say? ‘Father, save me from this time?’ But for this cause I came to this time.
Father, glorify your name!”

block.text: Sekarang jiwa-Ku terharu dan apakah yang akan Kukatakan? <Bapa, selamatkanlah Aku dari saat ini?> Tidak, sebab untuk itulah Aku datang ke dalam saat ini.
Bapa, muliakanlah nama-Mu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then there came a voice out of the sky, saying,

block.text: Maka terdengarlah suara dari sorga:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.”

block.text: <<Aku telah memuliakan-Nya, dan Aku akan memuliakan-Nya lagi!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude therefore, who stood by and heard it, said:

block.text: Orang banyak yang berdiri di situ dan mendengarkannya berkata,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is thunder!”

block.text: bahwa itu bunyi guntur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others said,

block.text: Ada pula yang berkata:

block.characterId: crowd preparing for Passover Feast, others

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: crowd preparing for Passover Feast, others
ReferenceBlocks.text: “An angel has spoken to him.”

block.text: <<Seorang malaikat telah berbicara dengan Dia.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This voice hasn't come for my sake, but for your sakes.

block.text: <<Suara itu telah terdengar bukan oleh karena Aku, melainkan oleh karena kamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now is the judgment of this world. Now the prince of this world will be cast out.

block.text: Sekarang berlangsung penghakiman atas dunia ini: sekarang juga penguasa dunia ini akan dilemparkan ke luar;

ReferenceBlocks.text: And when I am lifted up from the earth, I will draw all people to myself.”

block.text: dan Aku, apabila Aku ditinggikan dari bumi, Aku akan menarik semua orang datang kepada-Ku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he said this, signifying by what kind of death he should die.
The multitude answered him,

block.text: Ini dikatakan-Nya untuk menyatakan bagaimana caranya Ia akan mati.
Lalu jawab orang banyak itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We have heard out of the law that the Christ remains forever. How do you say, ‘The Son of Man must be lifted up?’ Who is this Son of Man?”

block.text: <<Kami telah mendengar dari hukum Taurat, bahwa Mesias tetap hidup selama-lamanya; bagaimana mungkin Engkau mengatakan, <bahwa Anak Manusia harus ditinggikan?> <Siapakah Anak Manusia itu?> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore said to them,

block.text: Kata Yesus kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yet a little while the light is with you. Walk while you have the light, that darkness doesn't overtake you. He who walks in the darkness doesn't know where he is going.

block.text: <<Hanya sedikit waktu lagi terang ada di antara kamu. Selama terang itu ada padamu, percayalah kepadanya, supaya kegelapan jangan menguasai kamu; barangsiapa berjalan dalam kegelapan, ia tidak tahu ke mana ia pergi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While you have the light, believe in the light, that you may become children of light.”

block.text: Percayalah kepada terang itu, selama terang itu ada padamu, supaya kamu menjadi anak-anak terang.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said these things, and he departed and hid himself from them.

block.text: Sesudah berkata demikian, Yesus pergi bersembunyi dari antara mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But though he had done so many signs before them, yet they didn't believe in him.

block.text: Dan meskipun Yesus mengadakan begitu banyak mujizat di depan mata mereka, namun mereka tidak percaya kepada-Nya,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore the word of Isaiah the prophet was fulfilled, which he spoke,

block.text: supaya genaplah firman yang disampaikan oleh nabi Yesaya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, who has believed our report? To whom has the arm of the Lord been revealed?”

block.text: <<Tuhan, siapakah yang percaya kepada pemberitaan kami? Dan kepada siapakah tangan kekuasaan Tuhan dinyatakan?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause they couldn't believe, for Isaiah said again,

block.text: Karena itu mereka tidak dapat percaya, sebab Yesaya telah berkata juga:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has blinded their eyes and he hardened their heart, lest they should see with their eyes, and perceive with their heart, and would turn, and I would heal them.”

block.text: <<Ia telah membutakan mata dan mendegilkan hati mereka, supaya mereka jangan melihat dengan mata, dan menanggap dengan hati, lalu berbalik, sehingga Aku menyembuhkan mereka.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Isaiah said these things when he saw his glory, and spoke of him.

block.text: Hal ini dikatakan oleh Yesaya, karena ia telah melihat kemuliaan-Nya dan telah berkata-kata tentang Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless even of the rulers many believed in him, but because of the Pharisees they didn't confess it, so that they wouldn't be put out of the synagogue.

block.text: Namun banyak juga di antara pemimpin yang percaya kepada-Nya, tetapi oleh karena orang-orang Farisi mereka tidak mengakuinya berterus terang, supaya mereka jangan dikucilkan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They loved men's praise more than God's praise.
Jesus cried out and said,

block.text: Sebab mereka lebih suka akan kehormatan manusia dari pada kehormatan Allah.
Tetapi Yesus berseru kata-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whoever believes in me, believes not in me, but in him who sent me.

block.text: <<Barangsiapa percaya kepada-Ku, ia bukan percaya kepada-Ku, tetapi kepada Dia, yang telah mengutus Aku;

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who sees me sees him who sent me.

block.text: dan barangsiapa melihat Aku, ia melihat Dia, yang telah mengutus Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have come as a light into the world, that whoever believes in me may not remain in the darkness.

block.text: Aku telah datang ke dalam dunia sebagai terang, supaya setiap orang yang percaya kepada-Ku, jangan tinggal di dalam kegelapan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone listens to my sayings, and doesn't believe, I don't judge him. For I came not to judge the world, but to save the world.

block.text: Dan jikalau seorang mendengar perkataan-Ku, tetapi tidak melakukannya, Aku tidak menjadi hakimnya, sebab Aku datang bukan untuk menghakimi dunia, melainkan untuk menyelamatkannya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who rejects me, and doesn't receive my sayings, has one who judges him. The word that I spoke, the same will judge him in the last day.

block.text: <<Barangsiapa menolak Aku, dan tidak menerima perkataan-Ku, ia sudah ada hakimnya, yaitu firman yang telah Kukatakan, itulah yang akan menjadi hakimnya pada akhir zaman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I spoke not from myself, but the Father who sent me, he gave me a commandment, what I should say, and what I should speak.

block.text: Sebab Aku berkata-kata bukan dari diri-Ku sendiri, tetapi Bapa, yang mengutus Aku, Dialah yang memerintahkan Aku untuk mengatakan apa yang harus Aku katakan dan Aku sampaikan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know that his commandment is eternal life. The things therefore which I speak, even as the Father has said to me, so I speak.”

block.text: Dan Aku tahu, bahwa perintah-Nya itu adalah hidup yang kekal. Jadi apa yang Aku katakan, Aku menyampaikannya sebagaimana yang difirmankan oleh Bapa kepada-Ku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 13
Now before the feast of the Passover, Jesus, knowing that his time had come that he would depart from this world to the Father, having loved his own who were in the world, he loved them to the end.

block.text: Sementara itu sebelum hari raya Paskah mulai, Yesus telah tahu, bahwa saat-Nya sudah tiba untuk beralih dari dunia ini kepada Bapa. Sama seperti Ia senantiasa mengasihi murid-murid-Nya demikianlah sekarang Ia mengasihi mereka sampai kepada kesudahannya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: During supper, the devil having already put into the heart of Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, to betray him,

block.text: Mereka sedang makan bersama, dan Iblis telah membisikkan rencana dalam hati Yudas Iskariot, anak Simon, untuk mengkhianati Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus knew that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he came forth from God, and was going to God.

block.text: Yesus tahu, bahwa Bapa-Nya telah menyerahkan segala sesuatu kepada-Nya dan bahwa Ia datang dari Allah dan kembali kepada Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He arose from supper and laid aside his outer garments. He took a towel, and wrapped a towel around his waist.

block.text: Lalu bangunlah Yesus dan menanggalkan jubah-Nya. Ia mengambil sehelai kain lenan dan mengikatkannya pada pinggang-Nya,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he poured water into the basin, and began to wash the disciples’ feet, and to wipe them with the towel that was wrapped around him.

block.text: kemudian Ia menuangkan air ke dalam sebuah basi, dan mulai membasuh kaki murid-murid-Nya lalu menyekanya dengan kain yang terikat pada pinggang-Nya itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he came to Simon Peter. He said to him,

block.text: Maka sampailah Ia kepada Simon Petrus. Kata Petrus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, do you wash my feet?”

block.text: <<Tuhan, Engkau hendak membasuh kakiku?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Jawab Yesus kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You don't know what I am doing now, but you will understand later.”

block.text: <<Apa yang Kuperbuat, engkau tidak tahu sekarang, tetapi engkau akan mengertinya kelak.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter said to him,

block.text: Kata Petrus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You will never wash my feet!”

block.text: <<Engkau tidak akan membasuh kakiku sampai selama-lamanya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If I don't wash you, you have no part with me.”

block.text: <<Jikalau Aku tidak membasuh engkau, engkau tidak mendapat bagian dalam Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter said to him,

block.text: Kata Simon Petrus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head!”

block.text: <<Tuhan, jangan hanya kakiku saja, tetapi juga tangan dan kepalaku!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Kata Yesus kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Someone who has bathed only needs to have his feet washed, but is completely clean. You are clean, but not all of you.”

block.text: <<Barangsiapa telah mandi, ia tidak usah membasuh diri lagi selain membasuh kakinya, karena ia sudah bersih seluruhnya. Juga kamu sudah bersih, hanya tidak semua.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he knew him who would betray him, therefore he said, “You are not all clean.”

block.text: Sebab Ia tahu, siapa yang akan menyerahkan Dia. Karena itu Ia berkata: <<Tidak semua kamu bersih.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: So when he had washed their feet, put his outer garment back on, and sat down again, he said to them,

block.text: Sesudah Ia membasuh kaki mereka, Ia mengenakan pakaian-Nya dan kembali ke tempat-Nya. Lalu Ia berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you know what I have done to you?

block.text: <<Mengertikah kamu apa yang telah Kuperbuat kepadamu?

ReferenceBlocks.text: You call me, ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord.’ You say so correctly, for so I am.

block.text: Kamu menyebut Aku Guru dan Tuhan, dan katamu itu tepat, sebab memang Akulah Guru dan Tuhan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I then, the Lord and the Teacher has washed your feet, you also ought to wash one another's feet.

block.text: Jadi jikalau Aku membasuh kakimu, Aku yang adalah Tuhan dan Gurumu, maka kamupun wajib saling membasuh kakimu;

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I have given you an example, that you also should do as I have done to you.

block.text: sebab Aku telah memberikan suatu teladan kepada kamu, supaya kamu juga berbuat sama seperti yang telah Kuperbuat kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, a servant is not greater than his lord, neither one who is sent greater than he who sent him.

block.text: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya seorang hamba tidaklah lebih tinggi dari pada tuannya, ataupun seorang utusan dari pada dia yang mengutusnya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you know these things, blessed are you if you do them.

block.text: Jikalau kamu tahu semua ini, maka berbahagialah kamu, jika kamu melakukannya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: I don't speak concerning all of you. I know whom I have chosen. But that the Scripture may be fulfilled, ‘He who eats bread with me has lifted up his heel against me.’

block.text: <<Bukan tentang kamu semua Aku berkata. Aku tahu, siapa yang telah Kupilih. Tetapi haruslah genap nas ini: <Orang yang makan roti-Ku, telah mengangkat tumitnya terhadap Aku.>

ReferenceBlocks.text: From now on, I tell you before it happens, that when it happens, you may believe that I am he.

block.text: Aku mengatakannya kepadamu sekarang juga sebelum hal itu terjadi, supaya jika hal itu terjadi, kamu percaya, bahwa Akulah Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, he who receives whomever I send, receives me; and he who receives me, receives him who sent me.”

block.text: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya barangsiapa menerima orang yang Kuutus, ia menerima Aku, dan barangsiapa menerima Aku, ia menerima Dia yang mengutus Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When Jesus had said this, he was troubled in spirit, and testified,

block.text: Setelah Yesus berkata demikian Ia sangat terharu, lalu bersaksi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you that one of you will betray me.”

block.text: <<Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya seorang di antara kamu akan menyerahkan Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples looked at one another, perplexed about whom he spoke.

block.text: Murid-murid itu memandang seorang kepada yang lain, mereka ragu-ragu siapa yang dimaksudkan-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of his disciples, whom Jesus loved, was at the table, leaning against Jesus’ breast.

block.text: Seorang di antara murid Yesus, yaitu murid yang dikasihi-Nya, bersandar dekat kepada-Nya, di sebelah kanan-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, and said to him,

block.text: Kepada murid itu Simon Petrus memberi isyarat dan berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Tell us who it is of whom he speaks.”

block.text: <<Tanyalah siapa yang dimaksudkan-Nya!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He, leaning back, as he was, on Jesus’ breast, asked him,

block.text: Murid yang duduk dekat Yesus itu berpaling dan berkata kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, who is it?”

block.text: <<Tuhan, siapakah itu?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore answered,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is he to whom I will give this piece of bread when I have dipped it.”

block.text: <<Dialah itu, yang kepadanya Aku akan memberikan roti, sesudah Aku mencelupkannya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: So when he had dipped the piece of bread, he gave it to Judas, the son of Simon Iscariot.

block.text: Sesudah berkata demikian Ia mengambil roti, mencelupkannya dan memberikannya kepada Yudas, anak Simon Iskariot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After the piece of bread, then Satan entered into him. Then Jesus said to him,

block.text: Dan sesudah Yudas menerima roti itu, ia kerasukan Iblis. Maka Yesus berkata kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What you do, do quickly.”

block.text: <<Apa yang hendak kauperbuat, perbuatlah dengan segera.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now no man at the table knew why he said this to him.

block.text: Tetapi tidak ada seorangpun dari antara mereka yang duduk makan itu mengerti, apa maksud Yesus mengatakan itu kepada Yudas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For some thought, because Judas had the money box, that Jesus said to him, “Buy what things we need for the feast,” or that he should give something to the poor.

block.text: Karena Yudas memegang kas ada yang menyangka, bahwa Yesus menyuruh dia membeli apa-apa yang perlu untuk perayaan itu, atau memberi apa-apa kepada orang miskin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore having received that morsel, he went out immediately. It was night.

block.text: Yudas menerima roti itu lalu segera pergi. Pada waktu itu hari sudah malam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had gone out, Jesus said,

block.text: Sesudah Yudas pergi, berkatalah Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now the Son of Man has been glorified, and God has been glorified in him.

block.text: <<Sekarang Anak Manusia dipermuliakan dan Allah dipermuliakan di dalam Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If God has been glorified in him, God will also glorify him in himself, and he will glorify him immediately.

block.text: Jikalau Allah dipermuliakan di dalam Dia, Allah akan mempermuliakan Dia juga di dalam diri-Nya, dan akan mempermuliakan Dia dengan segera.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Little children, I will be with you a little while longer. You will seek me, and as I said to the Jews, ‘Where I am going, you can't come,’ so now I tell you.

block.text: Hai anak-anak-Ku, hanya seketika saja lagi Aku ada bersama kamu. Kamu akan mencari Aku, dan seperti yang telah Kukatakan kepada orang-orang Yahudi: Ke tempat Aku pergi, tidak mungkin kamu datang, demikian pula Aku mengatakannya sekarang juga kepada kamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another, just like I have loved you; that you also love one another.

block.text: Aku memberikan perintah baru kepada kamu, yaitu supaya kamu saling mengasihi; sama seperti Aku telah mengasihi kamu demikian pula kamu harus saling mengasihi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By this everyone will know that you are my disciples, if you have love for one another.”

block.text: Dengan demikian semua orang akan tahu, bahwa kamu adalah murid-murid-Ku, yaitu jikalau kamu saling mengasihi.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter said to him,

block.text: Simon Petrus berkata kepada Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, where are you going?”

block.text: <<Tuhan, ke manakah Engkau pergi?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where I am going, you can't follow now, but you will follow afterwards.”

block.text: <<Ke tempat Aku pergi, engkau tidak dapat mengikuti Aku sekarang, tetapi kelak engkau akan mengikuti Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter said to him,

block.text: Kata Petrus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, why can't I follow you now? I will lay down my life for you.”

block.text: <<Tuhan, mengapa aku tidak dapat mengikuti Engkau sekarang? Aku akan memberikan nyawaku bagi-Mu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Will you lay down your life for me? Most certainly I tell you, the rooster won't crow until you have denied me three times.”

block.text: <<Nyawamu akan kauberikan bagi-Ku? Sesungguhnya Aku berkata kepadamu: Sebelum ayam berkokok, engkau telah menyangkal Aku tiga kali.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 14
“Don't let your heart be troubled. Believe in God. Believe also in me.

block.text: <<Janganlah gelisah hatimu; percayalah kepada Allah, percayalah juga kepada-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In my Father's house are many rooms. If it weren't so, I would have told you. I am going to prepare a place for you.

block.text: Di rumah Bapa-Ku banyak tempat tinggal. Jika tidak demikian, tentu Aku mengatakannya kepadamu. Sebab Aku pergi ke situ untuk menyediakan tempat bagimu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and will receive you to myself; that where I am, you may be there also.

block.text: Dan apabila Aku telah pergi ke situ dan telah menyediakan tempat bagimu, Aku akan datang kembali dan membawa kamu ke tempat-Ku, supaya di tempat di mana Aku berada, kamupun berada.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You know where I am going, and you know how to get there.”

block.text: Dan ke mana Aku pergi, kamu tahu jalan ke situ.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Thomas said to him,

block.text: Kata Tomas kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, we don't know where you are going. How can we know the way?”

block.text: <<Tuhan, kami tidak tahu ke mana Engkau pergi; jadi bagaimana kami tahu jalan ke situ?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Kata Yesus kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father, except through me.

block.text: <<Akulah jalan dan kebenaran dan hidup. Tidak ada seorangpun yang datang kepada Bapa, kalau tidak melalui Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you had known me, you would have known my Father also. From now on, you know him, and have seen him.”

block.text: Sekiranya kamu mengenal Aku, pasti kamu juga mengenal Bapa-Ku. Sekarang ini kamu mengenal Dia dan kamu telah melihat Dia.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Philip said to him,

block.text: Kata Filipus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, show us the Father, and that will be enough for us.”

block.text: <<Tuhan, tunjukkanlah Bapa itu kepada kami, itu sudah cukup bagi kami.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Kata Yesus kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have I been with you such a long time, and do you not know me, Philip? He who has seen me has seen the Father. How do you say, ‘Show us the Father?’

block.text: <<Telah sekian lama Aku bersama-sama kamu, Filipus, namun engkau tidak mengenal Aku? Barangsiapa telah melihat Aku, ia telah melihat Bapa; bagaimana engkau berkata: <Tunjukkanlah Bapa itu kepada kami.>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you believe that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? The words that I tell you, I speak not from myself; but the Father who lives in me does his works.

block.text: Tidak percayakah engkau, bahwa Aku di dalam Bapa dan Bapa di dalam Aku? Apa yang Aku katakan kepadamu, tidak Aku katakan dari diri-Ku sendiri, tetapi Bapa, yang diam di dalam Aku, Dialah yang melakukan pekerjaan-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Believe me that I am in the Father, and the Father in me; or else believe me for the very works’ sake.

block.text: Percayalah kepada-Ku, bahwa Aku di dalam Bapa dan Bapa di dalam Aku; atau setidak-tidaknya, percayalah karena pekerjaan-pekerjaan itu sendiri.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, he who believes in me, the works that I do, he will do also; and he will do greater works than these, because I am going to my Father.

block.text: <<Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya barangsiapa percaya kepada-Ku, ia akan melakukan juga pekerjaan-pekerjaan yang Aku lakukan, bahkan pekerjaan-pekerjaan yang lebih besar dari pada itu. Sebab Aku pergi kepada Bapa;

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whatever you will ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

block.text: dan apa juga yang kamu minta dalam nama-Ku, Aku akan melakukannya, supaya Bapa dipermuliakan di dalam Anak.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you will ask anything in my name, I will do it.

block.text: Jika kamu meminta sesuatu kepada-Ku dalam nama-Ku, Aku akan melakukannya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you love me, keep my commandments.

block.text: <<Jikalau kamu mengasihi Aku, kamu akan menuruti segala perintah-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will pray to the Father, and he will give you another Comforter, that he may be with you forever.

block.text: Aku akan minta kepada Bapa, dan Ia akan memberikan kepadamu seorang Penolong yang lain, supaya Ia menyertai kamu selama-lamanya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is the Spirit of truth, whom the world can't receive; for it doesn't see him, neither knows him. You know him, for he lives with you, and will be in you.

block.text: Yaitu Roh Kebenaran. Dunia tidak dapat menerima Dia, sebab dunia tidak melihat Dia dan tidak mengenal Dia. Tetapi kamu mengenal Dia, sebab Ia menyertai kamu dan akan diam di dalam kamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will not leave you orphans. I will come to you.

block.text: Aku tidak akan meninggalkan kamu sebagai yatim piatu. Aku datang kembali kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet a little while, and the world will see me no more; but you will see me. Because I live, you will live also.

block.text: Tinggal sesaat lagi dan dunia tidak akan melihat Aku lagi, tetapi kamu melihat Aku, sebab Aku hidup dan kamupun akan hidup.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: In that day you will know that I am in my Father, and you in me, and I in you.

block.text: <<Pada waktu itulah kamu akan tahu, bahwa Aku di dalam Bapa-Ku dan kamu di dalam Aku dan Aku di dalam kamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One who has my commandments, and keeps them, that person is one who loves me. One who loves me will be loved by my Father, and I will love him, and will reveal myself to him.”

block.text: Barangsiapa memegang perintah-Ku dan melakukannya, dialah yang mengasihi Aku. Dan barangsiapa mengasihi Aku, ia akan dikasihi oleh Bapa-Ku dan Akupun akan mengasihi dia dan akan menyatakan diri-Ku kepadanya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas (not Iscariot) said to him,

block.text: Yudas, yang bukan Iskariot, berkata kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, what has happened that you are about to reveal yourself to us, and not to the world?”

block.text: <<Tuhan, apakah sebabnya maka Engkau hendak menyatakan diri-Mu kepada kami, dan bukan kepada dunia?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If a man loves me, he will keep my word. My Father will love him, and we will come to him, and make our home with him.

block.text: <<Jika seorang mengasihi Aku, ia akan menuruti firman-Ku dan Bapa-Ku akan mengasihi dia dan Kami akan datang kepadanya dan diam bersama-sama dengan dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who doesn't love me doesn't keep my words. The word which you hear isn't mine, but the Father's who sent me.

block.text: Barangsiapa tidak mengasihi Aku, ia tidak menuruti firman-Ku; dan firman yang kamu dengar itu bukanlah dari pada-Ku, melainkan dari Bapa yang mengutus Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have said these things to you, while still living with you.

block.text: Semuanya itu Kukatakan kepadamu, selagi Aku berada bersama-sama dengan kamu;

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Counselor, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, he will teach you all things, and will remind you of all that I said to you.

block.text: tetapi Penghibur, yaitu Roh Kudus, yang akan diutus oleh Bapa dalam nama-Ku, Dialah yang akan mengajarkan segala sesuatu kepadamu dan akan mengingatkan kamu akan semua yang telah Kukatakan kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peace I leave with you. My peace I give to you; not as the world gives, give I to you. Don't let your heart be troubled, neither let it be fearful.

block.text: Damai sejahtera Kutinggalkan bagimu. Damai sejahtera-Ku Kuberikan kepadamu, dan apa yang Kuberikan tidak seperti yang diberikan oleh dunia kepadamu. Janganlah gelisah dan gentar hatimu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: You heard how I told you, ‘I go away, and I come to you.’ If you loved me, you would have rejoiced, because I said ‘I am going to my Father;’ for the Father is greater than I.

block.text: <<Kamu telah mendengar, bahwa Aku telah berkata kepadamu: <Aku pergi, tetapi Aku datang kembali kepadamu.> Sekiranya kamu mengasihi Aku, kamu tentu akan bersukacita karena Aku pergi kepada Bapa-Ku, sebab Bapa lebih besar dari pada Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I have told you before it happens so that, when it happens, you may believe.

block.text: Dan sekarang juga Aku mengatakannya kepadamu sebelum hal itu terjadi, supaya kamu percaya, apabila hal itu terjadi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will no more speak much with you, for the prince of the world comes, and he has nothing in me.

block.text: Tidak banyak lagi Aku berkata-kata dengan kamu, sebab penguasa dunia ini datang dan ia tidak berkuasa sedikitpun atas diri-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But that the world may know that I love the Father, and as the Father commanded me, even so I do. Arise, let us go from here.”

block.text: Tetapi supaya dunia tahu, bahwa Aku mengasihi Bapa dan bahwa Aku melakukan segala sesuatu seperti yang diperintahkan Bapa kepada-Ku, bangunlah, marilah kita pergi dari sini.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 15
“I am the true vine, and my Father is the farmer.

block.text: <<Akulah pokok anggur yang benar dan Bapa-Kulah pengusahanya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every branch in me that doesn't bear fruit, he takes away. Every branch that bears fruit, he prunes, that it may bear more fruit.

block.text: Setiap ranting pada-Ku yang tidak berbuah, dipotong-Nya dan setiap ranting yang berbuah, dibersihkan-Nya, supaya ia lebih banyak berbuah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are already pruned clean because of the word which I have spoken to you.

block.text: Kamu memang sudah bersih karena firman yang telah Kukatakan kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remain in me, and I in you. As the branch can't bear fruit by itself, unless it remains in the vine, so neither can you, unless you remain in me.

block.text: Tinggallah di dalam Aku dan Aku di dalam kamu. Sama seperti ranting tidak dapat berbuah dari dirinya sendiri, kalau ia tidak tinggal pada pokok anggur, demikian juga kamu tidak berbuah, jikalau kamu tidak tinggal di dalam Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am the vine. You are the branches. He who remains in me, and I in him, the same bears much fruit, for apart from me you can do nothing.

block.text: <<Akulah pokok anggur dan kamulah ranting-rantingnya. Barangsiapa tinggal di dalam Aku dan Aku di dalam dia, ia berbuah banyak, sebab di luar Aku kamu tidak dapat berbuat apa-apa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If a man doesn't remain in me, he is thrown out as a branch, and is withered; and they gather them, throw them into the fire, and they are burned.

block.text: Barangsiapa tidak tinggal di dalam Aku, ia dibuang ke luar seperti ranting dan menjadi kering, kemudian dikumpulkan orang dan dicampakkan ke dalam api lalu dibakar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you remain in me, and my words remain in you, you will ask whatever you desire, and it will be done for you.”

block.text: Jikalau kamu tinggal di dalam Aku dan firman-Ku tinggal di dalam kamu, mintalah apa saja yang kamu kehendaki, dan kamu akan menerimanya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In this is my Father glorified, that you bear much fruit; and so you will be my disciples.

block.text: Dalam hal inilah Bapa-Ku dipermuliakan, yaitu jika kamu berbuah banyak dan dengan demikian kamu adalah murid-murid-Ku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as the Father has loved me, I also have loved you. Remain in my love.

block.text: <<Seperti Bapa telah mengasihi Aku, demikianlah juga Aku telah mengasihi kamu; tinggallah di dalam kasih-Ku itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you keep my commandments, you will remain in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and remain in his love.

block.text: Jikalau kamu menuruti perintah-Ku, kamu akan tinggal di dalam kasih-Ku, seperti Aku menuruti perintah Bapa-Ku dan tinggal di dalam kasih-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have spoken these things to you, that my joy may remain in you, and that your joy may be made full.”

block.text: Semuanya itu Kukatakan kepadamu, supaya sukacita-Ku ada di dalam kamu dan sukacitamu menjadi penuh.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is my commandment, that you love one another, even as I have loved you.

block.text: Inilah perintah-Ku, yaitu supaya kamu saling mengasihi, seperti Aku telah mengasihi kamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greater love has no one than this, that someone lay down his life for his friends.

block.text: Tidak ada kasih yang lebih besar dari pada kasih seorang yang memberikan nyawanya untuk sahabat-sahabatnya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are my friends, if you do whatever I command you.

block.text: Kamu adalah sahabat-Ku, jikalau kamu berbuat apa yang Kuperintahkan kepadamu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: No longer do I call you servants, for the servant doesn't know what his lord does. But I have called you friends, for everything that I heard from my Father, I have made known to you.

block.text: <<Aku tidak menyebut kamu lagi hamba, sebab hamba tidak tahu, apa yang diperbuat oleh tuannya, tetapi Aku menyebut kamu sahabat, karena Aku telah memberitahukan kepada kamu segala sesuatu yang telah Kudengar dari Bapa-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You didn't choose me, but I chose you, and appointed you, that you should go and bear fruit, and that your fruit should remain; that whatever you will ask of the Father in my name, he may give it to you.”

block.text: Bukan kamu yang memilih Aku, tetapi Akulah yang memilih kamu. Dan Aku telah menetapkan kamu, supaya kamu pergi dan menghasilkan buah dan buahmu itu tetap, supaya apa yang kamu minta kepada Bapa dalam nama-Ku, diberikan-Nya kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I command these things to you, that you may love one another.

block.text: Inilah perintah-Ku kepadamu: Kasihilah seorang akan yang lain.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: If the world hates you, you know that it has hated me before it hated you.

block.text: <<Jikalau dunia membenci kamu, ingatlah bahwa ia telah lebih dahulu membenci Aku dari pada kamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you were of the world, the world would love its own. But because you are not of the world, since I chose you out of the world, therefore the world hates you.

block.text: Sekiranya kamu dari dunia, tentulah dunia mengasihi kamu sebagai miliknya. Tetapi karena kamu bukan dari dunia, melainkan Aku telah memilih kamu dari dunia, sebab itulah dunia membenci kamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember the word that I said to you: ‘A servant is not greater than his lord.’ If they persecuted me, they will also persecute you. If they kept my word, they will keep yours also.

block.text: Ingatlah apa yang telah Kukatakan kepadamu: <Seorang hamba tidaklah lebih tinggi dari pada tuannya.> Jikalau mereka telah menganiaya Aku, mereka juga akan menganiaya kamu; jikalau mereka telah menuruti firman-Ku, mereka juga akan menuruti perkataanmu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But all these things will they do to you for my name's sake, because they don't know him who sent me.

block.text: Tetapi semuanya itu akan mereka lakukan terhadap kamu karena nama-Ku, sebab mereka tidak mengenal Dia, yang telah mengutus Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I had not come and spoken to them, they would not have had sin; but now they have no excuse for their sin.

block.text: Sekiranya Aku tidak datang dan tidak berkata-kata kepada mereka, mereka tentu tidak berdosa. Tetapi sekarang mereka tidak mempunyai dalih bagi dosa mereka!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who hates me, hates my Father also.

block.text: <<Barangsiapa membenci Aku, ia membenci juga Bapa-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I hadn't done among them the works which no one else did, they wouldn't have had sin. But now have they seen and also hated both me and my Father.

block.text: Sekiranya Aku tidak melakukan pekerjaan di tengah-tengah mereka seperti yang tidak pernah dilakukan orang lain, mereka tentu tidak berdosa. Tetapi sekarang walaupun mereka telah melihat semuanya itu, namun mereka membenci baik Aku maupun Bapa-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But this happened so that the word may be fulfilled which was written in their law, ‘They hated me without a cause.’”

block.text: Tetapi firman yang ada tertulis dalam kitab Taurat mereka harus digenapi: <Mereka membenci Aku tanpa alasan.>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When the Counselor has come, whom I will send to you from the Father, the Spirit of truth, who proceeds from the Father, he will testify about me.

block.text: Jikalau Penghibur yang akan Kuutus dari Bapa datang, yaitu Roh Kebenaran yang keluar dari Bapa, Ia akan bersaksi tentang Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will also testify, because you have been with me from the beginning.”

block.text: Tetapi kamu juga harus bersaksi, karena kamu dari semula bersama-sama dengan Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 16
“These things have I spoken to you, so that you wouldn't be caused to stumble.

block.text: <<Semuanya ini Kukatakan kepadamu, supaya kamu jangan kecewa dan menolak Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will put you out of the synagogues. Yes, the time comes that whoever kills you will think that he offers service to God.

block.text: Kamu akan dikucilkan, bahkan akan datang saatnya bahwa setiap orang yang membunuh kamu akan menyangka bahwa ia berbuat bakti bagi Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will do these things because they have not known the Father, nor me.

block.text: Mereka akan berbuat demikian, karena mereka tidak mengenal baik Bapa maupun Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have told you these things, so that when the time comes, you may remember that I told you about them. I didn't tell you these things from the beginning, because I was with you.

block.text: Tetapi semuanya ini Kukatakan kepadamu, supaya apabila datang saatnya kamu ingat, bahwa Aku telah mengatakannya kepadamu.>> <<Hal ini tidak Kukatakan kepadamu dari semula, karena selama ini Aku masih bersama-sama dengan kamu,

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now I am going to him who sent me, and none of you asks me, ‘Where are you going?’

block.text: tetapi sekarang Aku pergi kepada Dia yang telah mengutus Aku, dan tiada seorangpun di antara kamu yang bertanya kepada-Ku: <Ke mana Engkau pergi?>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But because I have told you these things, sorrow has filled your heart.

block.text: Tetapi karena Aku mengatakan hal itu kepadamu, sebab itu hatimu berdukacita.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth: It is to your advantage that I go away, for if I don't go away, the Counselor won't come to you. But if I go, I will send him to you.

block.text: Namun benar yang Kukatakan ini kepadamu: Adalah lebih berguna bagi kamu, jika Aku pergi. Sebab jikalau Aku tidak pergi, Penghibur itu tidak akan datang kepadamu, tetapi jikalau Aku pergi, Aku akan mengutus Dia kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he has come, he will convict the world about sin, about righteousness, and about judgment;

block.text: Dan kalau Ia datang, Ia akan menginsafkan dunia akan dosa, kebenaran dan penghakiman;

ReferenceBlocks.text: about sin, because they don't believe in me;

block.text: akan dosa, karena mereka tetap tidak percaya kepada-Ku;

ReferenceBlocks.text: about righteousness, because I am going to my Father, and you won't see me any more;

block.text: akan kebenaran, karena Aku pergi kepada Bapa dan kamu tidak melihat Aku lagi;

ReferenceBlocks.text: about judgment, because the prince of this world has been judged.”

block.text: akan penghakiman, karena penguasa dunia ini telah dihukum.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have yet many things to tell you, but you can't bear them now.

block.text: <<Masih banyak hal yang harus Kukatakan kepadamu, tetapi sekarang kamu belum dapat menanggungnya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However when he, the Spirit of truth, has come, he will guide you into all truth, for he will not speak from himself; but whatever he hears, he will speak. He will declare to you things that are coming.

block.text: Tetapi apabila Ia datang, yaitu Roh Kebenaran, Ia akan memimpin kamu ke dalam seluruh kebenaran; sebab Ia tidak akan berkata-kata dari diri-Nya sendiri, tetapi segala sesuatu yang didengar-Nya itulah yang akan dikatakan-Nya dan Ia akan memberitakan kepadamu hal-hal yang akan datang.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will glorify me, for he will take from what is mine, and will declare it to you.

block.text: Ia akan memuliakan Aku, sebab Ia akan memberitakan kepadamu apa yang diterimanya dari pada-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All things whatever the Father has are mine; therefore I said that he takes of mine, and will declare it to you.

block.text: Segala sesuatu yang Bapa punya, adalah Aku punya; sebab itu Aku berkata: Ia akan memberitakan kepadamu apa yang diterimanya dari pada-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A little while, and you will not see me. Again a little while, and you will see me, because I go to the Father.”

block.text: Tinggal sesaat saja dan kamu tidak melihat Aku lagi dan tinggal sesaat saja pula dan kamu akan melihat Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of his disciples therefore said to one another,

block.text: Mendengar itu beberapa dari murid-Nya berkata seorang kepada yang lain:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is this that he says to us, ‘A little while, and you won't see me, and again a little while, and you will see me;’ and, ‘Because I go to the Father?’”

block.text: <<Apakah artinya Ia berkata kepada kita: <Tinggal sesaat saja dan kamu tidak melihat Aku dan tinggal sesaat saja pula dan kamu akan melihat Aku?> Dan: <Aku pergi kepada Bapa?> >>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said therefore,

block.text: Mereka mengatakan oleh karena itu,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What does he mean by, ‘A little while?’ We don't know what he is saying.”

block.text: <<Apakah artinya Ia berkata: Tinggal sesaat saja? Kita tidak tahu apa maksud-Nya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore Jesus perceived that they wanted to ask him, and he said to them,

block.text: Yesus tahu, bahwa mereka hendak menanyakan sesuatu kepada-Nya, lalu Ia berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you inquire among yourselves concerning this, that I said, ‘A little while, and you won't see me, and again a little while, and you will see me?’

block.text: <<Adakah kamu membicarakan seorang dengan yang lain apa yang Kukatakan tadi, yaitu: <Tinggal sesaat saja dan kamu tidak melihat Aku dan tinggal sesaat saja pula dan kamu akan melihat Aku?>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, that you will weep and lament, but the world will rejoice. You will be sorrowful, but your sorrow will be turned into joy.

block.text: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya kamu akan menangis dan meratap, tetapi dunia akan bergembira; kamu akan berdukacita, tetapi dukacitamu akan berubah menjadi sukacita.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A woman, when she gives birth, has sorrow, because her time has come. But when she has delivered the child, she doesn't remember the anguish any more, for the joy that a human being is born into the world.

block.text: Seorang perempuan berdukacita pada saat ia melahirkan, tetapi sesudah ia melahirkan anaknya, ia tidak ingat lagi akan penderitaannya, karena kegembiraan bahwa seorang manusia telah dilahirkan ke dunia.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore you now have sorrow, but I will see you again, and your heart will rejoice, and no one will take your joy away from you.”

block.text: <<Demikian juga kamu sekarang diliputi dukacita, tetapi Aku akan melihat kamu lagi dan hatimu akan bergembira dan tidak ada seorangpun yang dapat merampas kegembiraanmu itu dari padamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In that day you will ask me no questions. Most certainly I tell you, whatever you may ask of the Father in my name, he will give it to you.

block.text: Dan pada hari itu kamu tidak akan menanyakan apa-apa kepada-Ku. Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya segala sesuatu yang kamu minta kepada Bapa, akan diberikan-Nya kepadamu dalam nama-Ku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Until now, you have asked nothing in my name. Ask, and you will receive, that your joy may be made full.

block.text: Sampai sekarang kamu belum meminta sesuatupun dalam nama-Ku. Mintalah maka kamu akan menerima, supaya penuhlah sukacitamu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have spoken these things to you in figures of speech. But the time is coming when I will no more speak to you in figures of speech, but will tell you plainly about the Father.

block.text: <<Semuanya ini Kukatakan kepadamu dengan kiasan. Akan tiba saatnya Aku tidak lagi berkata-kata kepadamu dengan kiasan, tetapi terus terang memberitakan Bapa kepadamu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In that day you will ask in my name; and I will not ask the Father for you.

block.text: Pada hari itu kamu akan berdoa dalam nama-Ku. Dan tidak Aku katakan kepadamu, bahwa Aku meminta bagimu kepada Bapa,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Father himself loves you because you have loved me, and have believed that I came forth from God.

block.text: sebab Bapa sendiri mengasihi kamu, karena kamu telah mengasihi Aku dan percaya, bahwa Aku datang dari Allah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I came out from the Father, and have come into the world. Again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.”

block.text: Aku datang dari Bapa dan Aku datang ke dalam dunia; Aku meninggalkan dunia pula dan pergi kepada Bapa.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: His disciples said to him,

block.text: Kata murid-murid-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, now you speak plainly, and speak no figures of speech.
Now we know that you know all things, and don't need for anyone to question you. By this we believe that you came forth from God.”

block.text: <<Lihat, sekarang Engkau terus terang berkata-kata dan Engkau tidak memakai kiasan.
Sekarang kami tahu, bahwa Engkau mengetahui segala sesuatu dan tidak perlu orang bertanya kepada-Mu. Karena itu kami percaya, bahwa Engkau datang dari Allah.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Jawab Yesus kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you now believe?
Behold, the time is coming, yes, and has now come, that you will be scattered, everyone to his own place, and you will leave me alone. Yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.

block.text: <<Percayakah kamu sekarang?

Lihat, saatnya datang, bahkan sudah datang, bahwa kamu diceraiberaikan masing-masing ke tempatnya sendiri dan kamu meninggalkan Aku seorang diri. Namun Aku tidak seorang diri, sebab Bapa menyertai Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have told you these things, that in me you may have peace. In the world you have oppression; but cheer up! I have overcome the world.”

block.text: Semuanya itu Kukatakan kepadamu, supaya kamu beroleh damai sejahtera dalam Aku. Dalam dunia kamu menderita penganiayaan, tetapi kuatkanlah hatimu, Aku telah mengalahkan dunia.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 17
Jesus said these things, and lifting up his eyes to heaven, he said,

block.text: Demikianlah kata Yesus. Lalu Ia menengadah ke langit dan berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Father, the time has come. Glorify your Son, that your Son may also glorify you.

block.text: <<Bapa, telah tiba saatnya; permuliakanlah Anak-Mu, supaya Anak-Mu mempermuliakan Engkau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as you gave him authority over all flesh, he will give eternal life to all whom you have given him.

block.text: Sama seperti Engkau telah memberikan kepada-Nya kuasa atas segala yang hidup, demikian pula Ia akan memberikan hidup yang kekal kepada semua yang telah Engkau berikan kepada-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is eternal life, that they should know you, the only true God, and him whom you sent, Jesus Christ.

block.text: Inilah hidup yang kekal itu, yaitu bahwa mereka mengenal Engkau, satu-satunya Allah yang benar, dan mengenal Yesus Kristus yang telah Engkau utus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I glorified you on the earth. I have accomplished the work which you have given me to do.

block.text: Aku telah mempermuliakan Engkau di bumi dengan jalan menyelesaikan pekerjaan yang Engkau berikan kepada-Ku untuk melakukannya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now, Father, glorify me with your own self with the glory which I had with you before the world existed.

block.text: Oleh sebab itu, ya Bapa, permuliakanlah Aku pada-Mu sendiri dengan kemuliaan yang Kumiliki di hadirat-Mu sebelum dunia ada.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: I revealed your name to the people whom you have given me out of the world. They were yours, and you have given them to me. They have kept your word.

block.text: << Aku telah menyatakan nama-Mu kepada semua orang, yang Engkau berikan kepada-Ku dari dunia. Mereka itu milik-Mu dan Engkau telah memberikan mereka kepada-Ku dan mereka telah menuruti firman-Mu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now they have known that all things whatever you have given me are from you.

block.text: Sekarang mereka tahu, bahwa semua yang Engkau berikan kepada-Ku itu berasal dari pada-Mu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the words which you have given me I have given to them, and they received them, and knew for sure that I came forth from you, and they have believed that you sent me.

block.text: Sebab segala firman yang Engkau sampaikan kepada-Ku telah Kusampaikan kepada mereka dan mereka telah menerimanya. Mereka tahu benar-benar, bahwa Aku datang dari pada-Mu, dan mereka percaya, bahwa Engkaulah yang telah mengutus Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray for them. I don't pray for the world, but for those whom you have given me, for they are yours.

block.text: Aku berdoa untuk mereka. Bukan untuk dunia Aku berdoa, tetapi untuk mereka, yang telah Engkau berikan kepada-Ku, sebab mereka adalah milik-Mu

ReferenceBlocks.text: All things that are mine are yours, and yours are mine, and I am glorified in them.

block.text: dan segala milik-Ku adalah milik-Mu dan milik-Mu adalah milik-Ku, dan Aku telah dipermuliakan di dalam mereka.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I am coming to you. Holy Father, keep them through your name which you have given me, that they may be one, even as we are.

block.text: <<Dan Aku tidak ada lagi di dalam dunia, tetapi mereka masih ada di dalam dunia, dan Aku datang kepada-Mu. Ya Bapa yang kudus, peliharalah mereka dalam nama-Mu, yaitu nama-Mu yang telah Engkau berikan kepada-Ku, supaya mereka menjadi satu sama seperti Kita.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in your name. Those whom you have given me I have kept. None of them is lost, except the son of destruction, that the Scripture might be fulfilled.

block.text: Selama Aku bersama mereka, Aku memelihara mereka dalam nama-Mu, yaitu nama-Mu yang telah Engkau berikan kepada-Ku; Aku telah menjaga mereka dan tidak ada seorangpun dari mereka yang binasa selain dari pada dia yang telah ditentukan untuk binasa, supaya genaplah yang tertulis dalam Kitab Suci.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now I come to you, and I say these things in the world, that they may have my joy made full in themselves.

block.text: <<Tetapi sekarang, Aku datang kepada-Mu dan Aku mengatakan semuanya ini sementara Aku masih ada di dalam dunia, supaya penuhlah sukacita-Ku di dalam diri mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have given them your word. The world hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

block.text: Aku telah memberikan firman-Mu kepada mereka dan dunia membenci mereka, karena mereka bukan dari dunia, sama seperti Aku bukan dari dunia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray not that you would take them from the world, but that you would keep them from the evil one.

block.text: Aku tidak meminta, supaya Engkau mengambil mereka dari dunia, tetapi supaya Engkau melindungi mereka dari pada yang jahat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They are not of the world even as I am not of the world.

block.text: Mereka bukan dari dunia, sama seperti Aku bukan dari dunia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Sanctify them in your truth. Your word is truth.
As you sent me into the world, even so I have sent them into the world.

block.text: Kuduskanlah mereka dalam kebenaran; firman-Mu adalah kebenaran.
Sama seperti Engkau telah mengutus Aku ke dalam dunia, demikian pula Aku telah mengutus mereka ke dalam dunia;

ReferenceBlocks.text: For their sakes I sanctify myself, that they themselves also may be sanctified in truth.

block.text: dan Aku menguduskan diri-Ku bagi mereka, supaya merekapun dikuduskan dalam kebenaran.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Not for these only do I pray, but for those also who believe in me through their word,

block.text: <<Dan bukan untuk mereka ini saja Aku berdoa, tetapi juga untuk orang-orang, yang percaya kepada-Ku oleh pemberitaan mereka;

ReferenceBlocks.text: that they may all be one; even as you, Father, are in me, and I in you, that they also may be one in us; that the world may believe that you sent me.

block.text: supaya mereka semua menjadi satu, sama seperti Engkau, ya Bapa, di dalam Aku dan Aku di dalam Engkau, agar mereka juga di dalam Kita, supaya dunia percaya, bahwa Engkaulah yang telah mengutus Aku.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The glory which you have given me, I have given to them; that they may be one, even as we are one;

block.text: Dan Aku telah memberikan kepada mereka kemuliaan, yang Engkau berikan kepada-Ku, supaya mereka menjadi satu, sama seperti Kita adalah satu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: I in them, and you in me, that they may be perfected into one; that the world may know that you sent me, and loved them, even as you loved me.

block.text: Aku di dalam mereka dan Engkau di dalam Aku supaya mereka sempurna menjadi satu, agar dunia tahu, bahwa Engkau yang telah mengutus Aku dan bahwa Engkau mengasihi mereka, sama seperti Engkau mengasihi Aku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Father, I desire that they also whom you have given me be with me where I am, that they may see my glory, which you have given me, for you loved me before the foundation of the world.

block.text: <<Ya Bapa, Aku mau supaya, di manapun Aku berada, mereka juga berada bersama-sama dengan Aku, mereka yang telah Engkau berikan kepada-Ku, agar mereka memandang kemuliaan-Ku yang telah Engkau berikan kepada-Ku, sebab Engkau telah mengasihi Aku sebelum dunia dijadikan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Righteous Father, the world hasn't known you, but I knew you; and these knew that you sent me.

block.text: Ya Bapa yang adil, memang dunia tidak mengenal Engkau, tetapi Aku mengenal Engkau, dan mereka ini tahu, bahwa Engkaulah yang telah mengutus Aku;

ReferenceBlocks.text: I made known to them your name, and will make it known; that the love with which you loved me may be in them, and I in them.”

block.text: dan Aku telah memberitahukan nama-Mu kepada mereka dan Aku akan memberitahukannya, supaya kasih yang Engkau berikan kepada-Ku ada di dalam mereka dan Aku di dalam mereka.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 18
When Jesus had spoken these words, he went out with his disciples over the brook Kidron, where there was a garden, into which he and his disciples entered.

block.text: Setelah Yesus mengatakan semuanya itu keluarlah Ia dari situ bersama-sama dengan murid-murid-Nya dan mereka pergi ke seberang sungai Kidron. Di situ ada suatu taman dan Ia masuk ke taman itu bersama-sama dengan murid-murid-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Judas, who betrayed him, also knew the place, for Jesus often met there with his disciples.

block.text: Yudas, yang mengkhianati Yesus, tahu juga tempat itu, karena Yesus sering berkumpul di situ dengan murid-murid-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas then, having taken a detachment of soldiers and officers from the chief priests and the Pharisees, came there with lanterns, torches, and weapons.

block.text: Maka datanglah Yudas juga ke situ dengan sepasukan prajurit dan penjaga-penjaga Bait Allah yang disuruh oleh imam-imam kepala dan orang-orang Farisi lengkap dengan lentera, suluh dan senjata.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore, knowing all the things that were happening to him, went forth, and said to them,

block.text: Maka Yesus, yang tahu semua yang akan menimpa diri-Nya, maju ke depan dan berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who are you looking for?”

block.text: <<Siapakah yang kamu cari?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered him,

block.text: Jawab mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Jesus of Nazareth.”

block.text: <<Yesus dari Nazaret.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Kata-Nya kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am he.”

block.text: <<Akulah Dia.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas also, who betrayed him, was standing with them.

block.text: Yudas yang mengkhianati Dia berdiri juga di situ bersama-sama mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore he said to them, “I am he,” they went backward, and fell to the ground.
Again therefore he asked them,

block.text: Ketika Ia berkata kepada mereka: <<Akulah Dia,>> mundurlah mereka dan jatuh ke tanah.
Maka Ia bertanya pula:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who are you looking for?”

block.text: <<Siapakah yang kamu cari?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Kata mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Jesus of Nazareth.”

block.text: <<Yesus dari Nazaret.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I told you that I am he. If therefore you seek me, let these go their way,”

block.text: <<Telah Kukatakan kepadamu, Akulah Dia. Jika Aku yang kamu cari, biarkanlah mereka ini pergi.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: that the word might be fulfilled which he spoke, “Of those whom you have given me, I have lost none.”

block.text: Demikian hendaknya supaya genaplah firman yang telah dikatakan-Nya: <<Dari mereka yang Engkau serahkan kepada-Ku, tidak seorangpun yang Kubiarkan binasa.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter therefore, having a sword, drew it, and struck the high priest's servant, and
cut off his right ear.

block.text: Lalu Simon Petrus, yang membawa pedang, menghunus pedang itu, menetakkannya kepada hamba Imam Besar dan memutuskan
telinga kanannya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The servant's name was Malchus.
Jesus therefore said to Peter,

block.text: Nama hamba itu Malkhus.
Kata Yesus kepada Petrus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Put the sword into its sheath. The cup which the Father has given me, shall I not surely drink it?”

block.text: <<Sarungkan pedangmu itu; bukankah Aku harus minum cawan yang diberikan Bapa kepada-Ku?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: So the detachment, the commanding officer, and the officers of the Jews, seized Jesus and bound him.

block.text: Maka pasukan prajurit serta perwiranya dan penjaga-penjaga yang disuruh orang Yahudi itu menangkap Yesus dan membelenggu Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They led him to Annas first, for he was father-in-law to Caiaphas, who was high priest that year.

block.text: Lalu mereka membawa-Nya mula-mula kepada Hanas, karena Hanas adalah mertua Kayafas, yang pada tahun itu menjadi Imam Besar;

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now it was Caiaphas who advised the Jews that it was expedient that one man should perish for the people.

block.text: dan Kayafaslah yang telah menasihatkan orang-orang Yahudi: <<Adalah lebih berguna jika satu orang mati untuk seluruh bangsa.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter followed Jesus, as did another disciple. Now that disciple was known to the high priest, and entered in with Jesus into the court of the high priest;

block.text: Simon Petrus dan seorang murid lain mengikuti Yesus. Murid itu mengenal Imam Besar dan ia masuk bersama-sama dengan Yesus ke halaman istana Imam Besar,

ReferenceBlocks.text: but Peter was standing at the door outside. So the other disciple, who was known to the high priest, went out and spoke to her who kept the door, and brought in Peter.

block.text: tetapi Petrus tinggal di luar dekat pintu. Maka murid lain tadi, yang mengenal Imam Besar, kembali ke luar, bercakap-cakap dengan perempuan penjaga pintu lalu membawa Petrus masuk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the servant girl who kept the door said to Peter,

block.text: Maka kata hamba perempuan penjaga pintu kepada Petrus:

block.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you also one of this man's disciples?”

block.text: <<Bukankah engkau juga murid orang itu?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Jawab Petrus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am not.”

block.text: <<Bukan!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the servants and the officers were standing there, having made a fire of coals, for it was cold. They were warming themselves. Peter was with them, standing and warming himself.

block.text: Sementara itu hamba-hamba dan penjaga-penjaga Bait Allah telah memasang api arang, sebab hawa dingin waktu itu, dan mereka berdiri berdiang di situ. Juga Petrus berdiri berdiang bersama-sama dengan mereka.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The high priest therefore asked Jesus about his disciples, and about his teaching.
Jesus answered him,

block.text: Maka mulailah Imam Besar menanyai Yesus tentang murid-murid-Nya dan tentang ajaran-Nya.
Jawab Yesus kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I spoke openly to the world. I always taught in synagogues, and in the temple, where the Jews always meet. I said nothing in secret.

block.text: <<Aku berbicara terus terang kepada dunia: Aku selalu mengajar di rumah-rumah ibadat dan di Bait Allah, tempat semua orang Yahudi berkumpul; Aku tidak pernah berbicara sembunyi-sembunyi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why do you ask me? Ask those who have heard me what I said to them. Behold, these know the things which I said.”

block.text: Mengapakah engkau menanyai Aku? Tanyailah mereka, yang telah mendengar apa yang Kukatakan kepada mereka; sungguh, mereka tahu apa yang telah Kukatakan.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had said this, one of the officers standing by
slapped Jesus with his hand, saying,

block.text: Ketika Ia mengatakan hal itu, seorang penjaga yang berdiri di situ,
menampar muka-Nya sambil berkata:

block.characterId: officials of high priest, one of the

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: officials of high priest, one of the
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you answer the high priest like that?”

block.text: <<Begitukah jawab-Mu kepada Imam Besar?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Jawab Yesus kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If I have spoken evil, testify of the evil; but if well, why do you beat me?”

block.text: <<Jikalau kata-Ku itu salah, tunjukkanlah salahnya, tetapi jikalau kata-Ku itu benar, mengapakah engkau menampar Aku?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Annas sent him bound to Caiaphas, the high priest.

block.text: Maka Hanas mengirim Dia terbelenggu kepada Kayafas, Imam Besar itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Simon Peter was standing and warming himself. They said therefore to him,

block.text: Simon Petrus masih berdiri berdiang. Kata orang-orang di situ kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You aren't also one of his disciples, are you?”

block.text: <<Bukankah engkau juga seorang murid-Nya?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: He denied it, and said,

block.text: Ia menyangkalnya, katanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am not.”

block.text: <<Bukan.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of the servants of the high priest, being a relative of him whose ear Peter had cut off, said,

block.text: Kata seorang hamba Imam Besar, seorang keluarga dari hamba yang telinganya dipotong Petrus:

block.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Didn't I see you in the garden with him?”

block.text: <<Bukankah engkau kulihat di taman itu bersama-sama dengan Dia?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter therefore denied it again, and immediately the rooster crowed.

block.text: Maka Petrus menyangkalnya pula dan ketika itu berkokoklah ayam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They led Jesus therefore from Caiaphas into the Praetorium. It was early, and they themselves didn't enter into the Praetorium, that they might not be defiled, but might eat the Passover.

block.text: Maka mereka membawa Yesus dari Kayafas ke gedung pengadilan. Ketika itu hari masih pagi. Mereka sendiri tidak masuk ke gedung pengadilan itu, supaya jangan menajiskan diri, sebab mereka hendak makan Paskah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate therefore went out to them, and said,

block.text: Sebab itu Pilatus keluar mendapatkan mereka dan berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What accusation do you bring against this man?”

block.text: <<Apakah tuduhan kamu terhadap orang ini?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered him,

block.text: Jawab mereka kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If this man weren't an evildoer, we wouldn't have delivered him up to you.”

block.text: <<Jikalau Ia bukan seorang penjahat, kami tidak menyerahkan-Nya kepadamu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate therefore said to them,

block.text: Kata Pilatus kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take him yourselves, and judge him according to your law.”

block.text: <<Ambillah Dia dan hakimilah Dia menurut hukum Tauratmu.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore the Jews said to him,

block.text: Kata orang-orang Yahudi itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is not lawful for us to put anyone to death,”

block.text: <<Kami tidak diperbolehkan membunuh seseorang.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: that the word of Jesus might be fulfilled, which he spoke, signifying by what kind of death he should die.

block.text: Demikian hendaknya supaya genaplah firman Yesus, yang dikatakan-Nya untuk menyatakan bagaimana caranya Ia akan mati.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate therefore entered again into the Praetorium, called Jesus, and said to him,

block.text: Maka kembalilah Pilatus ke dalam gedung pengadilan, lalu memanggil Yesus dan bertanya kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you the King of the Jews?”

block.text: <<Engkau inikah raja orang Yahudi?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you say this by yourself, or did others tell you about me?”

block.text: <<Apakah engkau katakan hal itu dari hatimu sendiri, atau adakah orang lain yang mengatakannya kepadamu tentang Aku?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate answered,

block.text: Kata Pilatus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I'm not a Jew, am I? Your own nation and the chief priests delivered you to me. What have you done?”

block.text: <<Apakah aku seorang Yahudi? Bangsa-Mu sendiri dan imam-imam kepala yang telah menyerahkan Engkau kepadaku; apakah yang telah Engkau perbuat?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My Kingdom is not of this world. If my Kingdom were of this world, then my servants would fight, that I wouldn't be delivered to the Jews. But now my Kingdom is not from here.”

block.text: <<Kerajaan-Ku bukan dari dunia ini; jika Kerajaan-Ku dari dunia ini, pasti hamba-hamba-Ku telah melawan, supaya Aku jangan diserahkan kepada orang Yahudi, akan tetapi Kerajaan-Ku bukan dari sini.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate therefore said to him,

block.text: Maka kata Pilatus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you a king then?”

block.text: <<Jadi Engkau adalah raja?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Jawab Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You say that I am a king. For this reason I have been born, and for this reason I have come into the world, that I should testify to the truth. Everyone who is of the truth listens to my voice.”

block.text: <<Engkau mengatakan, bahwa Aku adalah raja. Untuk itulah Aku lahir dan untuk itulah Aku datang ke dalam dunia ini, supaya Aku memberi kesaksian tentang kebenaran; setiap orang yang berasal dari kebenaran mendengarkan suara-Ku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate said to him,

block.text: Kata Pilatus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is truth?”

block.text: <<Apakah kebenaran itu?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had said this, he went out again to the Jews, and said to them,

block.text: Sesudah mengatakan demikian, keluarlah Pilatus lagi mendapatkan orang-orang Yahudi dan berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I find no basis for a charge against him.

block.text: <<Aku tidak mendapati kesalahan apapun pada-Nya.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you have a custom, that I should release someone to you at the Passover. Therefore do you want me to release to you the King of the Jews?”

block.text: Tetapi pada kamu ada kebiasaan, bahwa pada Paskah aku membebaskan seorang bagimu. Maukah kamu, supaya aku membebaskan raja orang Yahudi bagimu?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they all shouted again, saying,

block.text: Mereka berteriak pula:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Not this man, but Barabbas!”

block.text: <<Jangan Dia, melainkan Barabas!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Barabbas was a robber.

block.text: Barabas adalah seorang penyamun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: JOHN CHP 19
So Pilate then took Jesus, and flogged him.

block.text: Lalu Pilatus mengambil Yesus dan menyuruh orang menyesah Dia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The soldiers twisted thorns into a crown, and put it on his head, and dressed him in a purple garment.
They kept saying,

block.text: Prajurit-prajurit menganyam sebuah mahkota duri dan menaruhnya di atas kepala-Nya. Mereka memakaikan Dia jubah ungu,
dan sambil maju ke depan mereka berkata:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hail, King of the Jews!”

block.text: <<Salam, hai raja orang Yahudi!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: and they kept slapping him.
Then Pilate went out again, and said to them,

block.text: Lalu mereka menampar muka-Nya.
Pilatus keluar lagi dan berkata kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I bring him out to you, that you may know that I find no basis for a charge against him.”

block.text: <<Lihatlah, aku membawa Dia ke luar kepada kamu, supaya kamu tahu, bahwa aku tidak mendapati kesalahan apapun pada-Nya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus therefore came out, wearing the crown of thorns and the purple garment. Pilate said to them,

block.text: Lalu Yesus keluar, bermahkota duri dan berjubah ungu. Maka kata Pilatus kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, the man!”

block.text: <<Lihatlah manusia itu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore the chief priests and the officers saw him, they shouted, saying,

block.text: Ketika imam-imam kepala dan penjaga-penjaga itu melihat Dia, berteriaklah mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Crucify! Crucify!”

block.text: <<Salibkan Dia, salibkan Dia!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate said to them,

block.text: Kata Pilatus kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take him yourselves, and crucify him, for I find no basis for a charge against him.”

block.text: <<Ambil Dia dan salibkan Dia; sebab aku tidak mendapati kesalahan apapun pada-Nya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Jews answered him,

block.text: Jawab orang-orang Yahudi itu kepadanya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We have a law, and by our law he ought to die, because he made himself the Son of God.”

block.text: <<Kami mempunyai hukum dan menurut hukum itu Ia harus mati, sebab Ia menganggap diri-Nya sebagai Anak Allah.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore Pilate heard this saying, he was more afraid.

block.text: Ketika Pilatus mendengar perkataan itu bertambah takutlah ia,

ReferenceBlocks.text: He entered into the Praetorium again, and said to Jesus,

block.text: lalu ia masuk pula ke dalam gedung pengadilan dan berkata kepada Yesus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where are you from?”

block.text: <<Dari manakah asal-Mu?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus gave him no answer.
Pilate therefore said to him,

block.text: Tetapi Yesus tidak memberi jawab kepadanya.
Maka kata Pilatus kepada-Nya:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Aren't you speaking to me? Don't you know that I have power to release you, and have power to crucify you?”

block.text: <<Tidakkah Engkau mau bicara dengan aku? Tidakkah Engkau tahu, bahwa aku berkuasa untuk membebaskan Engkau, dan berkuasa juga untuk menyalibkan Engkau?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Yesus menjawab:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You would have no power at all against me, unless it were given to you from above. Therefore he who delivered me to you has greater sin.”

block.text: <<Engkau tidak mempunyai kuasa apapun terhadap Aku, jikalau kuasa itu tidak diberikan kepadamu dari atas. Sebab itu: dia, yang menyerahkan Aku kepadamu, lebih besar dosanya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: At this, Pilate was seeking to release him, but the Jews cried out, saying,

block.text: Sejak itu Pilatus berusaha untuk membebaskan Dia, tetapi orang-orang Yahudi berteriak:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you release this man, you aren't Caesar's friend! Everyone who makes himself a king speaks against Caesar!”

block.text: <<Jikalau engkau membebaskan Dia, engkau bukanlah sahabat Kaisar. Setiap orang yang menganggap dirinya sebagai raja, ia melawan Kaisar.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When Pilate therefore heard these words, he brought Jesus out, and sat down on the judgment seat at a place called “The Pavement,” but in Hebrew, “Gabbatha.”

block.text: Ketika Pilatus mendengar perkataan itu, ia menyuruh membawa Yesus ke luar, dan ia duduk di kursi pengadilan, di tempat yang bernama Litostrotos, dalam bahasa Ibrani Gabata.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now it was the Preparation Day of the Passover, at about the sixth hour. He said to the Jews,

block.text: Hari itu ialah hari persiapan Paskah, kira-kira jam dua belas. Kata Pilatus kepada orang-orang Yahudi itu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, your King!”

block.text: <<Inilah rajamu!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cried out,

block.text: Maka berteriaklah mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Away with him! Away with him! Crucify him!”

block.text: <<Enyahkan Dia! Enyahkan Dia! Salibkan Dia!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate said to them,

block.text: Kata Pilatus kepada mereka:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Shall I crucify your King?”

block.text: <<Haruskah aku menyalibkan rajamu?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests answered,

block.text: Jawab imam-imam kepala:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We have no king but Caesar!”

block.text: <<Kami tidak mempunyai raja selain dari pada Kaisar!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then he delivered him to them to be crucified. So they took Jesus and led him away.

block.text: Akhirnya Pilatus menyerahkan Yesus kepada mereka untuk disalibkan. Mereka menerima Yesus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went out, bearing his cross, to the place called “The Place of a Skull”, which is called in Hebrew, “Golgotha”.

block.text: Sambil memikul salib-Nya Ia pergi ke luar ke tempat yang bernama Tempat Tengkorak, dalam bahasa Ibrani: Golgota.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There they crucified him, along with two others, one on either side, and Jesus in the middle.

block.text: Dan di situ Ia disalibkan mereka dan bersama-sama dengan Dia disalibkan juga dua orang lain, sebelah-menyebelah, Yesus di tengah-tengah.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate wrote a title also, and put it on the cross. There was written, “JESUS OF NAZARETH, THE KING OF THE JEWS.”

block.text: Dan Pilatus menyuruh memasang juga tulisan di atas kayu salib itu, bunyinya: <<Yesus, orang Nazaret, Raja orang Yahudi.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore many of the Jews read this title, for the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city; and it was written in Hebrew, in Latin, and in Greek.

block.text: Banyak orang Yahudi yang membaca tulisan itu, sebab tempat di mana Yesus disalibkan letaknya dekat kota dan kata-kata itu tertulis dalam bahasa Ibrani, bahasa Latin dan bahasa Yunani.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests of the Jews therefore said to Pilate,

block.text: Maka kata imam-imam kepala orang Yahudi kepada Pilatus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don't write, ‘The King of the Jews,’ but, ‘he said, I am King of the Jews.’”

block.text: <<Jangan engkau menulis: <Raja orang Yahudi,> tetapi bahwa Ia mengatakan: Aku adalah Raja orang Yahudi.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate answered,

block.text: Jawab Pilatus:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What I have written, I have written.”

block.text: <<Apa yang kutulis, tetap tertulis.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the soldiers, when they had crucified Jesus, took his garments and made four parts, to every soldier a part; and also the coat.

block.text: Sesudah prajurit-prajurit itu menyalibkan Yesus, mereka mengambil pakaian-Nya lalu membaginya menjadi empat bagian untuk tiap-tiap prajurit satu bagian—dan jubah-Nya juga mereka ambil.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the coat was without seam, woven from the top throughout.
Then they said to one another,

block.text: Jubah itu tidak berjahit, dari atas ke bawah hanya satu tenunan saja.
Karena itu mereka berkata seorang kepada yang lain:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let's not tear it, but cast lots for it to decide whose it will be,”

block.text: <<Janganlah kita membaginya menjadi beberapa potong, tetapi baiklah kita membuang undi untuk menentukan siapa yang mendapatnya.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: that the Scripture might be fulfilled, which says,

block.text: Demikianlah hendaknya supaya genaplah yang ada tertulis dalam Kitab Suci:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “They parted my garments among them. For my cloak they cast lots.”

block.text: <<Mereka membagi-bagi pakaian-Ku di antara mereka dan mereka membuang undi atas jubah-Ku.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore the soldiers did these things.

block.text: Hal itu telah dilakukan prajurit-prajurit itu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But there were standing by the cross of Jesus his mother, and his mother's sister, Mary the wife of Clopas, and Mary Magdalene.

block.text: Dan dekat salib Yesus berdiri ibu-Nya dan saudara ibu-Nya, Maria, isteri Klopas dan Maria Magdalena.
